name: bulbasaur
description:
A strange seed was planted on its back at
birth. The plant sprouts and grows with
this POKéMON.
c_description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this BULBASAUR.

name: ivysaur
description:
When the bulb on its back grows large, it
appears to lose the ability to stand on
its hind legs.
c_description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

name: venusaur
description:
Its plant blooms when it is absorbing
solar energy. It stays on the move to
seek sunlight.
c_description: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

name: charmander
description:
It has a preference for hot things.
When it rains, steam is said to spout from
the tip of its tail.
c_description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: charmeleon
description:
When it swings its burning tail, it
elevates the air temperature to 
unbearably high levels.
c_description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the air temperature to  unbearably high levels.

name: charizard
description:
It spits fire that is hot enough to melt
boulders. It may cause forest fires by
blowing flames.
c_description: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

name: squirtle
description:
After birth, its back swells and hardens
into a shell. It powerfully sprays foam 
from its mouth.
c_description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. It powerfully sprays foam  from its mouth.

name: wartortle
description:
It often hides in water to stalk unwary
prey. For fast swimming, it moves its
ears to maintain balance.
c_description: It often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For fast swimming, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

name: blastoise
description:
The pressurized water jets on this brutal
POKéMON’s shell are used for high-
speed tackles.
c_description: The pressurized water jets on this brutal BLASTOISE’s shell are used for high- speed tackles.

name: caterpie
description:
Its voracious appetite compels it to
devour leaves bigger than itself without
hesitation. It releases a terribly strong
odor from its antennae.
c_description: Its voracious appetite compels it to devour leaves bigger than itself without hesitation. It releases a terribly strong odor from its antennae.

name: metapod
description:
This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack
while its shell is soft, exposing its weak
and tender body.
c_description: This METAPOD is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

name: butterfree
description:
In battle, it flaps its wings at great
speed to release highly toxic dust into
the air.
c_description: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: weedle
description:
Often found in forests, eating leaves.
It has a sharp stinger on its head that
injects poison.
c_description: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp stinger on its head that injects poison.

name: kakuna
description:
Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON
can only harden its shell to protect
itself when it is in danger.
c_description: Almost incapable of moving, this KAKUNA can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.

name: beedrill
description:
May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent
speeds, all the while stabbing with the
toxic stinger on its rear.
c_description: May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.

name: pidgey
description:
A common sight in forests and woods.
It flaps its wings at ground level to kick
up blinding sand.
c_description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: pidgeotto
description:
Very protective of its sprawling
territorial area, this POKéMON will
fiercely peck at any intruder.
c_description: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this PIDGEOTTO will fiercely peck at any intruder.

name: pidgeot
description:
When hunting, it skims the surface of
water at high speed to pick off unwary
prey such as MAGIKARP.
c_description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.

name: rattata
description:
Its fangs are long and very sharp.
They grow continuously, so it gnaws on
hard things to whittle them down.
c_description: Its fangs are long and very sharp. They grow continuously, so it gnaws on hard things to whittle them down.

name: raticate
description:
Its rear feet have three toes each.
They are webbed, enabling it to swim
across rivers.
c_description: Its rear feet have three toes each. They are webbed, enabling it to swim across rivers.

name: spearow
description:
It busily flits around here and there.
Even if it is frail, it can be a tough
foe that uses MIRROR MOVE.
c_description: It busily flits around here and there. Even if it is frail, it can be a tough foe that uses MIRROR MOVE.

name: fearow
description:
With its huge and magnificent wings, it can
keep aloft without ever having to land
for rest.
c_description: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

name: ekans
description:
Moving silently and stealthily, it eats
the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY
and SPEAROW, whole.
c_description: Moving silently and stealthily, it eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

name: arbok
description:
It is rumored that the ferocious warning
markings on its belly differ from area to
area.
c_description: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

name: pikachu
description:
When several of these POKéMON gather,
their electricity can build and cause
lightning storms.
c_description: When several of these PIKACHU gather, their electricity can build and cause lightning storms.

name: raichu
description:
Its electric charges can reach even
100,000 volts. Careless contact can cause
even an Indian elephant to faint.
c_description: Its electric charges can reach even 100,000 volts. Careless contact can cause even an Indian elephant to faint.

name: sandshrew
description:
Burrows deep underground in arid locations
far from water. It only emerges to hunt
for prey.
c_description: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for prey.

name: sandslash
description:
Curls up into a spiny ball when
threatened. It can roll while curled up
to attack or escape.
c_description: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

name: nidoran-f
description:
Although small, its venomous barbs render
this POKéMON dangerous. The female has
smaller horns.
c_description: Although small, its venomous barbs render this NIDORAN-F dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

name: nidorina
description:
The female’s horns develop slowly.
Prefers physical attacks such as clawing
and biting.
c_description: The female’s horns develop slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.

name: nidoqueen
description:
Its hard scales provide strong protection.
It uses its hefty bulk to execute
powerful moves.
c_description: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

name: nidoran-m
description:
It stiffens its ears to sense danger.
The larger its horns, the more 
powerful its secreted venom.
c_description: It stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more  powerful its secreted venom.

name: nidorino
description:
Its horn is harder than a diamond.
If it senses a hostile presence, all the
barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it
challenges the foe with all its might.
c_description: Its horn is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.

name: nidoking
description:
It uses its powerful tail in battle to
smash, constrict, then break the prey’s
bones.
c_description: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey’s bones.

name: clefairy
description:
With its magical and cute appeal, it has 
many admirers. It is rare and found only
in certain areas.
c_description: With its magical and cute appeal, it has  many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

name: clefable
description:
A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen,
it will run and hide the moment it senses
people.
c_description: A timid fairy CLEFABLE that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.

name: vulpix
description:
When it is born, it has just one snow-
white tail. The tail splits from its tip as
it grows older.
c_description: When it is born, it has just one snow- white tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

name: ninetales
description:
Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing
one of its many tails could result in a
1,000-year curse.
c_description: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.

name: jigglypuff
description:
When its huge eyes waver, it sings a
mysteriously soothing melody that lulls
its enemies to sleep.
c_description: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

name: wigglytuff
description:
The body is soft and rubbery. When
angered, it will suck in air and inflate
itself to an enormous size.
c_description: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

name: zubat
description:
While living in pitch-black caverns, their
eyes gradually grew shut and deprived
them of vision. They use ultrasonic waves
to detect obstacles.
c_description: While living in pitch-black caverns, their eyes gradually grew shut and deprived them of vision. They use ultrasonic waves to detect obstacles.

name: golbat
description:
Once it bites, it will not stop draining
energy from the victim even if it gets too
heavy to fly.
c_description: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

name: oddish
description:
During the day, it keeps its face buried
in the ground. At night, it wanders around
sowing its seeds.
c_description: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

name: gloom
description:
The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn’t
drool. It is a nectar that is used to
attract prey.
c_description: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn’t drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

name: vileplume
description:
In seasons when it produces more pollen,
the air around a VILEPLUME turns yellow
with the powder as it walks. The pollen is
highly toxic and causes paralysis.
c_description: In seasons when it produces more pollen, the air around a VILEPLUME turns yellow with the powder as it walks. The pollen is highly toxic and causes paralysis.

name: paras
description:
Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms
on its back grow by drawing nutrients from
the bug host.
c_description: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.

name: parasect
description:
A host-parasite pair in which the parasite
mushroom has taken over the host bug.
Prefers damp places.
c_description: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

name: venonat
description:
Lives in the shadows of tall trees where
it eats bugs. It is attracted by light
at night.
c_description: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats bugs. It is attracted by light at night.

name: venomoth
description:
The wings are covered with dustlike
scales. Every time it flaps its wings, it
looses highly toxic dust.
c_description: The wings are covered with dustlike scales. Every time it flaps its wings, it looses highly toxic dust.

name: diglett
description:
It burrows through the ground at a
shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in
its wake, making it easy to spot.
c_description: It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.

name: dugtrio
description:
A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers
huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles
underground.
c_description: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

name: meowth
description:
All it does is sleep during the daytime.
At night, it patrols its territory with its
eyes aglow.
c_description: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.

name: persian
description:
Although its fur has many admirers, it is
tough to raise as a pet because of its
fickle meanness.
c_description: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

name: psyduck
description:
While lulling its enemies with its vacant
look, this wily POKéMON will use
psychokinetic powers.
c_description: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily PSYDUCK will use psychokinetic powers.

name: golduck
description:
The forelegs are webbed, helping to make
it an adept swimmer. It can be seen
swimming elegantly in lakes, etc.
c_description: The forelegs are webbed, helping to make it an adept swimmer. It can be seen swimming elegantly in lakes, etc.

name: mankey
description:
Extremely quick to anger. It could be
docile one moment, then thrashing away 
the next instant.
c_description: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment, then thrashing away  the next instant.

name: primeape
description:
Always furious and tenacious to boot.
It will not abandon chasing its quarry
until it catches up.
c_description: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it catches up.

name: growlithe
description:
It is very protective of its territory.
It will bark and bite to repel intruders
from its space.
c_description: It is very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

name: arcanine
description:
A POKéMON that has long been admired
for its beauty. It runs agilely as if
on wings.
c_description: A ARCANINE that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

name: poliwag
description:
Its newly grown legs prevent it from
walking well. It appears to prefer
swimming over walking.
c_description: Its newly grown legs prevent it from walking well. It appears to prefer swimming over walking.

name: poliwhirl
description:
It can live in or out of water. When out
of water, it constantly sweats to keep its
body slimy.
c_description: It can live in or out of water. When out of water, it constantly sweats to keep its body slimy.

name: poliwrath
description:
A swimmer adept at both the front crawl
and breaststroke. Easily overtakes the
best human swimmers.
c_description: A swimmer adept at both the front crawl and breaststroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

name: abra
description:
Using its ability to read minds, it will
sense impending danger and TELEPORT to
safety.
c_description: Using its ability to read minds, it will sense impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.

name: kadabra
description:
It happened one morning - a boy with
extrasensory powers awoke in bed
transformed into KADABRA.
c_description: It happened one morning - a boy with extrasensory powers awoke in bed transformed into KADABRA.

name: alakazam
description:
Its brain can outperform a supercomputer.
Its IQ (intelligence quotient) is said to
be around 5,000.
c_description: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its IQ (intelligence quotient) is said to be around 5,000.

name: machop
description:
Its whole body is composed of muscles.
Even though it’s the size of a human
child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.
c_description: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.

name: machoke
description:
Its muscular body is so powerful, it must
wear a power-save belt to be able to
regulate its motions.
c_description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: machamp
description:
Its superpowerful punches are said to
knock the victim flying clear over the
horizon.
c_description: Its superpowerful punches are said to knock the victim flying clear over the horizon.

name: bellsprout
description:
A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats
bugs. It appears to use its root feet to
replenish moisture.
c_description: A carnivorous BELLSPROUT that traps and eats bugs. It appears to use its root feet to replenish moisture.

name: weepinbell
description:
It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize
the enemy and then finishes it with a
spray of ACID.
c_description: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.

name: victreebel
description:
The long vine extending from its head is
waved about as if it were a living thing to
attract prey. When an unsuspecting victim
approaches, it is swallowed whole.
c_description: The long vine extending from its head is waved about as if it were a living thing to attract prey. When an unsuspecting victim approaches, it is swallowed whole.

name: tentacool
description:
Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook
them by accident are often punished by
their stingers.
c_description: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by their stingers.

name: tentacruel
description:
The tentacles are normally kept short.
On hunts, they are extended to ensnare
and immobilize prey.
c_description: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

name: geodude
description:
Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking
them for boulders, people often step or
trip on them.
c_description: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

name: graveler
description:
Be careful while hiking on mountain trails.
GRAVELER may come rolling down the path
without slowing.
c_description: Be careful while hiking on mountain trails. GRAVELER may come rolling down the path without slowing.

name: golem
description:
Its boulder-like body is extremely hard.
It can easily withstand dynamite blasts
without taking damage.
c_description: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without taking damage.

name: ponyta
description:
Its hooves are ten times harder than
diamond. It can trample anything
completely flat in little time.
c_description: Its hooves are ten times harder than diamond. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

name: rapidash
description:
It can gallop at a top speed of 150
miles per hour. It can race as fast as a
bullet train while ablaze.
c_description: It can gallop at a top speed of 150 miles per hour. It can race as fast as a bullet train while ablaze.

name: slowpoke
description:
It catches prey by dipping its tail in
water at the side of a river. But it often
forgets what it is doing and spends entire
days just loafing at water’s edge.
c_description: It catches prey by dipping its tail in water at the side of a river. But it often forgets what it is doing and spends entire days just loafing at water’s edge.

name: slowbro
description:
The SHELLDER that latches onto
SLOWPOKE’s tail is said to feed on the
host’s leftover scraps.
c_description: The SHELLDER that latches onto SLOWPOKE’s tail is said to feed on the host’s leftover scraps.

name: magnemite
description:
Uses antigravity to stay suspended.
Appears without warning and uses THUNDER
WAVE and similar moves.
c_description: Uses antigravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.

name: magneton
description:
Formed by several MAGNEMITE linked
together. They frequently appear when
sunspots flare up.
c_description: Formed by several MAGNEMITE linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

name: farfetchd
description:
The plant stalk it holds is its weapon.
The stalk is used like a sword to cut all
sorts of things.
c_description: The plant stalk it holds is its weapon. The stalk is used like a sword to cut all sorts of things.

name: doduo
description:
A bird that makes up for its poor flying
with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant
footprints.
c_description: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.

name: dodrio
description:
An odd species that is rarely found.
The three heads respectively represent
joy, sadness, and anger.
c_description: An odd species that is rarely found. The three heads respectively represent joy, sadness, and anger.

name: seel
description:
The protruding horn on its head is very
hard. It is used for bashing through thick
icebergs.
c_description: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick icebergs.

name: dewgong
description:
It stores thermal energy in the body.
It swims at a steady eight knots even in
intensely cold waters.
c_description: It stores thermal energy in the body. It swims at a steady eight knots even in intensely cold waters.

name: grimer
description:
Appears in filthy areas. It thrives by
sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped
out of factories.
c_description: Appears in filthy areas. It thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

name: muk
description:
Thickly covered with a filthy, vile
sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints
contain poison.
c_description: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

name: shellder
description:
Its hard shell repels any kind of attack.
It is vulnerable only when its shell is
open.
c_description: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

name: cloyster
description:
When attacked, it launches its horns in
quick volleys. Its innards have never been
seen.
c_description: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.

name: gastly
description:
Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON
cloaks the target and puts it to sleep
without notice.
c_description: Almost invisible, this gaseous GASTLY cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

name: haunter
description:
Because of its ability to slip through
block walls, it is said to be from another
dimension.
c_description: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.

name: gengar
description:
On the night of a full moon, if shadows
move on their own and laugh, it must be
GENGAR’s doing.
c_description: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be GENGAR’s doing.

name: onix
description:
As it grows, the stone portions of its
body harden to become similar to
black-colored diamonds.
c_description: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to black-colored diamonds.

name: drowzee
description:
Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their
dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating
only bad dreams.
c_description: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating only bad dreams.

name: hypno
description:
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will
use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS
and CONFUSION.
c_description: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.

name: krabby
description:
Its pincers are not only powerful weapons,
they are used for balance when walking
sideways.
c_description: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.

name: kingler
description:
The large pincer has 10,000-horsepower
crushing force. However, its huge size
makes it unwieldy to use.
c_description: The large pincer has 10,000-horsepower crushing force. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.

name: voltorb
description:
Usually found in power plants. Easily
mistaken for a POKé BALL, it has
zapped many people.
c_description: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, it has zapped many people.

name: electrode
description:
It stores electric energy under very high
pressure. It often explodes with little or
no provocation.
c_description: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

name: exeggcute
description:
It is often mistaken for eggs. When
disturbed, they quickly gather and attack
in swarms.
c_description: It is often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.

name: exeggutor
description:
It is said that on rare occasions, one
of its heads will drop off and continue on
as an EXEGGCUTE.
c_description: It is said that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.

name: cubone
description:
Because it never removes its skull helmet,
no one has ever seen this POKéMON’s real
face.
c_description: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this CUBONE’s real face.

name: marowak
description:
It is small and was originally very weak.
Its temperament turned ferocious when it
began using bones.
c_description: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.

name: hitmonlee
description:
When in a hurry, its legs lengthen
progressively. It runs smoothly with
extra-long, loping strides.
c_description: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra-long, loping strides.

name: hitmonchan
description:
While apparently doing nothing, it fires
punches in lightning-fast volleys that are
impossible to see.
c_description: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning-fast volleys that are impossible to see.

name: lickitung
description:
Its tongue can be extended like a
chameleon’s. It leaves a tingling
sensation when it licks enemies.
c_description: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon’s. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

name: koffing
description:
Because it stores several kinds of toxic
gases in its body, it is prone to
exploding without warning.
c_description: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.

name: weezing
description:
Where two kinds of poison gases meet, two
KOFFING can fuse into a WEEZING over
many years.
c_description: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, two KOFFING can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.

name: rhyhorn
description:
Its massive bones are 1,000 times harder
than human bones. Its TACKLE can knock a
semitrailer flying.
c_description: Its massive bones are 1,000 times harder than human bones. Its TACKLE can knock a semitrailer flying.

name: rhydon
description:
Protected by an armor-like hide, it is
capable of living in molten lava of 3,600
degrees Fahrenheit.
c_description: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: chansey
description:
A rare and elusive POKéMON that is said
to bring happiness to those who manage to
catch one.
c_description: A rare and elusive CHANSEY that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to catch one.

name: tangela
description:
The whole body is swathed with wide vines
that are similar to seaweed. The vines
sway as it walks.
c_description: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to seaweed. The vines sway as it walks.

name: kangaskhan
description:
The infant rarely ventures out of its
mother’s protective pouch until it is
three years old.
c_description: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother’s protective pouch until it is three years old.

name: horsea
description:
Known to shoot down flying bugs with
precision blasts of ink from the surface
of the water.
c_description: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

name: seadra
description:
It is capable of swimming backwards by
rapidly flapping its winglike pectoral fins
and stout tail.
c_description: It is capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its winglike pectoral fins and stout tail.

name: goldeen
description:
Its tail fin billows like an elegant
ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of
“The Water Queen.”
c_description: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of “The Water Queen.”

name: seaking
description:
The horn on its head is sharp like a
drill. It bores a hole in a boulder to
make its nest.
c_description: The horn on its head is sharp like a drill. It bores a hole in a boulder to make its nest.

name: staryu
description:
It appears in large numbers by seashores.
At night, its central core flashes with a
red light.
c_description: It appears in large numbers by seashores. At night, its central core flashes with a red light.

name: starmie
description:
Its central core glows with the seven
colors of the rainbow. Some people value
the core as a gem.
c_description: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

name: mr-mime
description:
If interrupted while it is miming, it will
suddenly DOUBLESLAP the offender with its
broad hands.
c_description: If interrupted while it is miming, it will suddenly DOUBLESLAP the offender with its broad hands.

name: scyther
description:
It tears and shreds prey with its wickedly
sharp scythes. It very rarely spreads its
wings to fly.
c_description: It tears and shreds prey with its wickedly sharp scythes. It very rarely spreads its wings to fly.

name: jynx
description:
It seductively wiggles its hips as it
walks. It can cause people to dance in
unison with it.
c_description: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

name: electabuzz
description:
Normally found near power plants, they
can wander away and cause major
blackouts in cities.
c_description: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.

name: magmar
description:
Its body always burns with an orange glow
that enables it to hide perfectly amidst
flames.
c_description: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly amidst flames.

name: pinsir
description:
If it fails to crush the foe in its
pincers, it will swing around and toss
the opponent.
c_description: If it fails to crush the foe in its pincers, it will swing around and toss the opponent.

name: tauros
description:
When it targets an enemy, it charges
furiously while whipping its body with its
long tails.
c_description: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.

name: magikarp
description:
In the distant past, it was somewhat
stronger than the horribly weak
descendants that exist today.
c_description: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

name: gyarados
description:
It is an extremely vicious and violent
POKéMON. When humans begin to fight,
it will appear and burn everything to the
ground with intensely hot flames.
c_description: It is an extremely vicious and violent GYARADOS. When humans begin to fight, it will appear and burn everything to the ground with intensely hot flames.

name: lapras
description:
A POKéMON that has been overhunted
almost to extinction. It can ferry people
on its back.
c_description: A LAPRAS that has been overhunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people on its back.

name: ditto
description:
Capable of copying an opponent’s genetic
code to instantly transform itself into a
duplicate of the enemy.
c_description: Capable of copying an opponent’s genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.

name: eevee
description:
Its genetic code is irregular. It may
mutate if it is exposed to radiation from
element STONES.
c_description: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONES.

name: vaporeon
description:
Lives close to water. Its long tail is
ridged with a fin which is often mistaken
for a mermaid’s.
c_description: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid’s.

name: jolteon
description:
It accumulates negative ions in the
atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt
lightning bolts.
c_description: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.

name: flareon
description:
When storing thermal energy in its body,
its temperature can soar to over 1,600
degrees Fahrenheit.
c_description: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature can soar to over 1,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: porygon
description:
Using the most advanced technologies,
scientists finally succeeded in making the
first artificial POKéMON.
c_description: Using the most advanced technologies, scientists finally succeeded in making the first artificial PORYGON.

name: omanyte
description:
Although long extinct, in rare cases, it
can be genetically regenerated from
fossils.
c_description: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically regenerated from fossils.

name: omastar
description:
Despite having strong fangs and tentacles,
it went extinct when its heavy shell made
it unable to catch prey.
c_description: Despite having strong fangs and tentacles, it went extinct when its heavy shell made it unable to catch prey.

name: kabuto
description:
A POKéMON that was regenerated from a
fossil found in what was once the ocean
floor long ago.
c_description: A KABUTO that was regenerated from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor long ago.

name: kabutops
description:
It swims freely through water. It catches
prey with its scythe-like arms and drains
the victim’s fluids.
c_description: It swims freely through water. It catches prey with its scythe-like arms and drains the victim’s fluids.

name: aerodactyl
description:
It was regenerated from a dinosaur’s
genetic matter that was found in amber.
It flies with high-pitched cries.
c_description: It was regenerated from a dinosaur’s genetic matter that was found in amber. It flies with high-pitched cries.

name: snorlax
description:
Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its
rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily
more slothful.
c_description: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

name: articuno
description:
A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to
appear to doomed people who are lost in
icy mountains.
c_description: A legendary bird ARTICUNO that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

name: zapdos
description:
One of the legendary bird POKéMON.
While it is flying, it makes crackling and
snapping sounds.
c_description: One of the legendary bird ZAPDOS. While it is flying, it makes crackling and snapping sounds.

name: moltres
description:
It is said to be the legendary bird
POKéMON of fire. Every flap of its wings
creates a dazzling flare of flames.
c_description: It is said to be the legendary bird MOLTRES of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flare of flames.

name: dratini
description:
Long considered a mythical POKéMON until
recently, when a small colony was found
living underwater.
c_description: Long considered a mythical DRATINI until recently, when a small colony was found living underwater.

name: dragonair
description:
It is said to live in seas and lakes.
Even though it has no wings, it has been
seen flying occasionally.
c_description: It is said to live in seas and lakes. Even though it has no wings, it has been seen flying occasionally.

name: dragonite
description:
Only a very few people ever see this
POKéMON. Its intelligence is said to
match that of humans.
c_description: Only a very few people ever see this DRAGONITE. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.

name: mewtwo
description:
It was created by a scientist after years
of horrific gene-splicing and DNA-
engineering experiments.
c_description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA- engineering experiments.
